mdRecord.dcterms:description: "... The house was built in 1810 by architect Russell Warren for George DeWolf, an American seafarer, slave trader and military general, and nephew of James DeWolf, also a slave trader and considered the second-wealthiest man in the United States at the time of his death in 1837..." -- http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Linden_Place [work]
